game

Class GoldenChest

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Chest
      • game.GoldenChest

  • public class GoldenChest
extends Chest
    GoldenChest is a class that extends the class Chest and represents a chest which has many items into it

    A GoldenChest object is characterized by the following informations.

    • An attribute open which says if the chest is open or close.
    • items that are in the golden chest.

    Version:
    1.0
